title: Sunday by the sea
creator_credit: Harlequin Productions, Leon Clore and Anthony Simmons
brief_description: Watching a typical day at the Brighton seaside, we see how the Londoner enjoys himself on one of his favourite excursions. Ballads made famous in music halls take the place of commentary. Photography by Walter Lassally. (Awards: Grand Prix, Venice)
creator_credit_for_label: Harlequin Productions, Leon Clore and Anthony Simmons
